item.title: NASA Universe on X: "Did you know that the location of the @NASAHubble Legacy Field image was chosen because it had no bright sources? But it isn’t filled with "nothing"! There are more than 250,000 galaxies in the Hubble Legacy Field. #NothingDay " / X
item.description: NASA Universe on X: "Did you know that the location of the @NASAHubble Legacy Field image was chosen because it had no bright sources? But it isn’t filled with "nothing"! There are more than 250,000 galaxies in the Hubble Legacy Field. 🔗 https://t.co/PAawEFrA4U #NothingDay 🔗 https://t.co/spG8MU05yD" / X 🔗 https://twitter.com/NASAUniverse/status/1747356050221650144

item.title: NASA Webb Telescope on X: "We did the Monster Math. It was a star graveyard smash! A bizarre structure dubbed the “Green Monster” lurks in the remains of this exploded star. By combining Webb & @ChandraXray data, scientists may have found its source in a blast wave from the star: " / X
item.description: NASA Webb Telescope on X: "We did the Monster Math. It was a star graveyard smash! A bizarre structure dubbed the “Green Monster” lurks in the remains of this exploded star. By combining Webb & @ChandraXray data, scientists may have found its source in a blast wave from the star: 🔗 https://t.co/s2yyDsjGOt 🔗 https://t.co/EPOBLRyxjv" / X 🔗 https://twitter.com/NASAWebb/status/1745891342952129002

item.title: Hubble on X: "Happy New Year's Eve! 🎉 You voted for NGC 1333 as our X audience's favorite 2023 Hubble image, so we're wrapping up the year with this stunning view of a star-forming region about 960 light-years away: Here's to more science and discovery in 2024! " / X
item.description: Hubble on X: "Happy New Year's Eve! 🎉 You voted for NGC 1333 as our X audience's favorite 2023 Hubble image, so we're wrapping up the year with this stunning view of a star-forming region about 960 light-years away: 🔗 https://t.co/r52aDgDPJD Here's to more science and discovery in 2024! 🔗 https://t.co/0hnlSPS7WR" / X 🔗 https://twitter.com/NASAHubble/status/1741503237566443821
